name: Energy Linux
body:
Building an ISO
---------------

#### Requirements

* Arch Linux running on x86_64
* archiso


#### Instructions

1. Clone it.
2. Run `make`.
3. Done.


Installing
----------

1. Write an ISO to CD or USB stick.
2. Boot it up.
3. Run `./install.sh`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
